column3: str
You wish to alter the properties of your Zodiac Weapon as granted by materia? Very well. Present to me a sphere scroll suitable for its enhancement.
Select the Zodiac Weapon Zeta whose properties you wish to alter.
<Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(1),9)/>.
Learn about the alteration process.
Cancel.
Where is the weapon? Perchance you forgot to bring it?
Please ensure that <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> is equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory before speaking with Jalzahn.
Did you not bring a new sphere scroll? Know that I cannot fulfill your request without one.
You do not possess <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/>. Sphere scrolls can be obtained from Hubairtin by exchanging bottles of superior enchanted ink.
I shall remove the power of materia from your arm and transfer it to a sphere scroll.
After you have finished reinfusing the scroll as you desire, bring it back to me, and I shall bond its light energy with your Zodiac Weapon.
The power of materia in <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> will be transferred to a sphere scroll. Proceed?
Yes
No
The sphere scroll has absorbed the materia-derived properties of your Zodiac Weapon Zeta. You may now redo the infusion process.
When you are satisfied with the results, present the scroll to Jalzahn once more to have its light energy bonded with your weapon.
If you wish to remove some of the infusion from the sphere scroll, you may do so by speaking with Hubairtin at the Bonfire in central Thanalan.
This sphere scroll must be infused with more materia before we can avail ourselves of its power.
When it is positively aglow with light energy, I expect that it will enhance your weapon like so.
So you wish for your Zodiac Weapon to receive of this sphere scroll's power? Very well.
When the process is complete, the weapon will be enhanced like so.
...It is done! Your weapon has been born anew, my friend. May it serve you well.
If you wish to alter the materia-enhanced properties of your Zodiac Weapon, first we must transfer that power to a suitable sphere scroll. You may then go about reinfusing the scroll as you desire.
When you are satisfied, return hither, and I shall bond the scroll's light energy with your weapon.
Sphere scrolls may be obtained from Hubairtin at the Bonfire in exchange for bottles of superior enchanted ink.
Please note that only uninfused scrolls are suitable for the transfer process. Unwanted infusions may be removed by speaking with Hubairtin.
